directions: Fish - Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with tin foil. Pat dry fish, leaving skin on if any. Drizzle a light coating of olive oil on both sides of fish, and place skin side down on baking sheet. Pour lemon juice over fish. Combine paprika, chili powder, and salt in small bowl. Season fish with herb mix. Bake until fish is cooked through, about 12-15 minutes, or until it becomes flakey when pulled with a fork. Break apart into bite size pieces.
Chili Pepper Cream Sauce - In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients, stir until combined. Store in refrigerator.
Mango Salsa - In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients, stir until combined. Store in refrigerator.
title: Salmon Tacos with Mango Salsa
